title: I NEED HELP. I am unable to log in to the game! "Cannot Reach Server"
body:
For the past few days I have tried to log in and the pop-up says that I am unable to reach the server. This has never happened before until recently. I have tried everything that the support page suggests and nothing has worked. I have not been able to play at all or do anything. Really, really annoying. Any advise on how to resolve this issue is greatly appreciated. 

Attached is a pop-up that i see after the Client tries to "Reach the server" after 3 attempts

replies.body:
Hey guys,

This error message usually pops up due to the fact that our Log-in Server was not able to establish a stable or consistent connection with your computer.  A large variety of different issues (from IE settings to Firewalls) can actually cause this to occur and deny you entry to the main client.  The quickest and fastest way to get this solved is to complete all of the steps in this troubleshooting guide:

https://support.riotgames.com/entries/234161-Login-Issues

Every step in this guide has been known to resolve this error message, so make sure that none of them are skipped!  Now, if you are still hitting this error message every time you login, even after completing all of these steps, don't walk away and give up just yet!  Make sure to [submit a new ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/anonymous_requests/new) to us!  We can look into your issue much more in-depth and provide some more specific solutions!  If you do submit a ticket, include the following information:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3

I'm having the same problem, but I got no fix either :(

I've been having the same problem for a few days. I've tried all the fixes I could find short of reinstalling windows and nothing's worked so far. For some reason I was able to log in exactly once this afternoon, but can't anymore. Because of that, I think the problems are probably with the ISP, so there's not much we can do. Hopefully it will fix itself before the preseason changes :/
Also add exceptions for League into your firewall and router settings.
I had the problem for a bout a week i had to reset my internet setting and my browser setting and it worked
